# Dashboard

- Admin user login successfully default showing dashboard page.

- This dashboard page showing for Institution Counts, Program Counts, Courses Counts and certificate Counts. Also showing Activity insights and Market Reach Analytics.


<img src="../../admin/dashboard.png" />

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Get Counts**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "body": {
                "certificateType": "education"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: getCountsRequest) {\n  getCounts(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>
